summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: CheckoutPage now uses the new hardcoded BTC address and submits it via createOrder as btcPaymentAddress. No other functional changes are clearly evidenced beyond meta/documentation updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata indicating new feature requests (AR-1/AR-2) and known issues in project_state.json
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to replace the displayed/used BTC address in checkout; it did not request changes to project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend-file-summaries.txt content describing many app features/pages/routes beyond the BTC address swap
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request maintaining or editing a global summary file; this appears to be documentation/metadata outside the specified requirement.
